arts.ttl: Coventry extend Championship lead after late Mason-Clark strike sinks Stoke
arts.athr: Sam Dalling at the Bet365 Stadium
arts.sum: When it arrived it was worth the wait. Ephron Mason-Clark had provided much of the quality, in a game largely devoid of it. So it was fitting that it was he who, with full time nearing, left the floor to meet Ellis Simms’ flick-on acrobatically and send 3,300 Coventry fans into a wild dance. Mason-Clark was left floored by Junior Tchamadeu who, as he had all afternoon, tried to halt his direct opponent on the Coventry left but arrived a fraction too late. Those in the blue corner did his celebrating for him, a rendition of Dean Martin’s Sway containing their No 10’s name filling the Stoke air for several minutes. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Coventry stike late to win at Stoke and extend Championship lead
arts.sum: Ephron Mason-Clark scored a dramatic late goal as Coventry beat Stoke 1-0 to stretch their lead at the top of the Sky Bet Championship.

arts.ttl: Abdoulie Manneh: Mjällby AIF share transfer latest on Coventry City and Stoke City target
arts.sum: Mjällby AIF sports manager Hasse Larsson has admitted they will sit down to discuss Abdoulie Manneh’s future amid interest from Coventry City and Stoke City. Fotboll Skanalen cover comments from him today about the 21-year-old. According to recent reports, clubs from the Premier League and Championship are keen on the winger. arts.ttl: Stoke City to rival Coventry City in pursuit of £3.6m rated winger
arts.sum: Coventry City and Stoke City are in the midst of a title fight this season, and now they could be battling on the transfer front too The post Stoke City to rival Coventry City in pursuit of £3.6m rated winger appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Stoke vs Coventry predictions: Potters can pick up a point
arts.sum: Stoke host Coventry in the Championship on Saturday and Dan Childs anticipates a close contest with neither team coming out on top.

arts.ttl: Abdoulie Manneh: Coventry City joined by Stoke City in transfer hunt
arts.sum: Coventry City will face competition from Stoke City in the race for Mjällby AIF’s Abdoulie Manneh, according to Fotboll Direkt. Three days ago, Expressen reported Coventry City were in negotiations with the Swedish club for the 21-year-old. They also stated Frank Lampard’s side were hoping to close the deal in the next few weeks.
